recipe.title: Cherry-Bourbon Soda Can Cocktail
instructions: Pour off or drink 5 oz. from cherry soda so that 7 oz. remain in can. Combine bourbon, Campari, and lemon juice in a measuring glass or cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and stir or shake well to combine, about 20 seconds. Strain into can.
